English: Immune to one Curse Kill. —It seems like the will of an ancient onmyōji can be felt.
Chinese: 免疫一次咒杀。 ——好像感受到了某位古代的阴阳师的意志。

English:
Seems to be under some kind of curse...? 
If a certain condition is met, the investigator may be Curse Killed.
Chinese:
身上似乎带着某种诅咒……？
如果达成某个条件的话，调查员可能会被咒杀。

English: When a monster carrying a curse appears, it can be Curse Killed. Can you hear, O Curse Master? O Curse Master seeking the secret art of rebirth... Go forth, and kill with curses—
Chinese: 当携带诅咒的怪物出现时，可将其咒杀。 听见了吗，咒主啊 寻求重生秘术的，咒主啊 去吧，用诅咒杀掉——

English:
Fight an elite enemy. 
Upon victory, receive a special reward. 
(Guaranteed reward: Relic - Curse Stone)
Chinese:
和精英怪战斗。
胜利时获得特别奖励。
（确定奖励：遗物 - 诅咒珠）

English: A park late at night. A shadowy figure seems to be lurking here.
Chinese:
深夜的公园。
似乎有个人影在此处游荡。
